title: Zeit Trended Mocha 2/18: Donda 2, Love Is Blind, National Wine Day, 'The First Lady', American Girl Doll, Pisces Season
itunes:title: Zeit Trended Mocha 2/18: Donda 2, Love Is Blind, National Wine Day, 'The First Lady', American Girl Doll, Pisces Season
description:
In this edition of Zeit Trended Mocha, Miles and super producer Becca discuss Kanye releasing Donda 2 only on a proprietary 'Stem Player', 'Love Is Blind' season 2, National Wine Day, the new Showtime show 'The First Lady', brunch at the American Girl Doll store, and Pisces Season!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
